attributes.action: Weddings - Using COVID rapid testing for guests so less restrictions required
attributes.additional_details: The lives of so many couples have been on hold. Wedding preparation is stressful at the best of times, but has been taken to another level with this added uncertainty. We can now hug. We can go out for dinner. We are slowly re-opening sports events. Surely by using proof of vaccine and rapid testing, we can start to remove social distancing & have dancing whilst offering other guests/venues/service providers a level of assurance. Please give couples & families the chance to celebrate properly
attributes.background: To consider the use of COVID rapid testing and proof of vaccination at weddings in order to allow dancing and remove social distancing. Make those who are planning the wedding responsible for requesting guests to be tested/show proof of vaccine and for ensuring results are returned before wedding.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
